desc.en: The 113th track in Blue Archive OST, a theme song for the RABBIT Squad. It has become a meme song symbolizing Blue Archive.
desc.jp: The 113th track in Blue Archive OST, a theme song for the RABBIT Squad. It has become a meme song symbolizing Blue Archive.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第113首曲子，“RABBIT小队”的主题曲。其目前已经成为象征蔚蓝档案的梗曲。

desc.en: Sensei and Miyako travel to an uninhabited island by walking across a drained mudflat to spend some leisure time together. Miyako is captivated by the beauty of the island and loses track of time, missing the opportunity to return before the tide rises again. While passing time waiting for the next low tide, they stumble upon a group of rabbits.
desc.jp: Sensei and Miyako travel to an uninhabited island by walking across a drained mudflat to spend some leisure time together. Miyako is captivated by the beauty of the island and loses track of time, missing the opportunity to return before the tide rises again. While passing time waiting for the next low tide, they stumble upon a group of rabbits.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cf都子}一起经过退潮的泥滩，前往无人岛玩耍。{cf都子}为了参观美丽的小岛，错过了回去的时间。{cf都子}和老师一边等待下次退潮一边杀时间，偶然在岛上发现了一群兔子。

hobby.jp: 動物系の動画鑑賞

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Saki and Sensei go up a mountain to pick up abandoned camping supplies. Sensei isn't used to hiking with a heavy bag and quickly gets tired, so Saki gives Sensei her shoulder pads to help.
desc.jp: Saki and Sensei go up a mountain to pick up abandoned camping supplies. Sensei isn't used to hiking with a heavy bag and quickly gets tired, so Saki gives Sensei her shoulder pads to help.
desc.zh_cn: 为了捡拾被丢弃的露营物资而上山的{cf咲希}和老师。但是不擅长爬山的老师很快就疲惫不堪，而{cf咲希}为了这样的老师，将自己使用的肩垫递给老师。

hobby.jp: 銃器の整備、植物などの採集

desc.en: RABBIT小隊的隊員協助奇普託斯的居民，且在公園繼續生活。另一方面，在奇普託斯的某處舉行了蓋瑪特利亞會議。
desc.jp: RABBIT小隊的隊員協助奇普託斯的居民，且在公園繼續生活。另一方面，在奇普託斯的某處舉行了蓋瑪特利亞會議。
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}的队员协助奇普托斯的居民，且在公园继续生活。另一方面，在奇普托斯的某处举行了{et盖玛特利亚}会议。

desc.en: RABBIT小隊幫助市民解決問題。市民向他們表示感謝，指出在小鎮決定變更行政級別後，許多基礎設施就被拆除，生活不便。RABBIT小隊表示，如有需要就去公園找他們；市民給了他們烤串作為報酬。
desc.jp: RABBIT小隊幫助市民解決問題。市民向他們表示感謝，指出在小鎮決定變更行政級別後，許多基礎設施就被拆除，生活不便。RABBIT小隊表示，如有需要就去公園找他們；市民給了他們烤串作為報酬。
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}帮助市民解决问题。市民向他们表示感谢，指出在小镇决定变更行政级别后，许多基础设施就被拆除，生活不便。{cnRABBIT小队}表示，如有需要就去公园找他们；市民给了他们烤串作为报酬。

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

desc.en: RABBIT小隊伴著燒旺的柴火，吃著新鮮的烤串，感到生活相當美好。萌還拿出了之前一直放著的汽水和蘑菇。他們的生活愉快而安定。
desc.jp: RABBIT小隊伴著燒旺的柴火，吃著新鮮的烤串，感到生活相當美好。萌還拿出了之前一直放著的汽水和蘑菇。他們的生活愉快而安定。
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}伴着烧旺的柴火，吃着新鲜的烤串，感到生活相当美好。{cf萌}还拿出了之前一直放着的汽水和蘑菇。他们的生活愉快而安定。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會的防衛部部長花耶收到了祕密來電。她提到計劃很快就要開始了。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會的防衛部部長花耶收到了祕密來電。她提到計劃很快就要開始了。
desc.zh_cn: 联邦学生会的防卫部部长花耶收到了秘密来电。她提到计划很快就要开始了。

desc.en: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 花耶是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 眾人聽了貝雅特里謝的話，大吃一驚。他們指出色彩會將基沃託斯毀於一旦，他們的探究也將付之東流，但貝雅特里謝並不在乎。貝雅特里謝重申，她的目標是為了變成偉大的存在，抹除老師；這一目標遭到眾人一致反對。
desc.jp: 眾人聽了貝雅特里謝的話，大吃一驚。他們指出色彩會將基沃託斯毀於一旦，他們的探究也將付之東流，但貝雅特里謝並不在乎。貝雅特里謝重申，她的目標是為了變成偉大的存在，抹除老師；這一目標遭到眾人一致反對。
desc.zh_cn: 众人听了{cf贝雅特里谢}的话，大吃一惊。他们指出色彩会将基沃托斯毁于一旦，他们的探究也将付之东流，但{cf贝雅特里谢}并不在乎。{cf贝雅特里谢}重申，她的目标是为了变成伟大的存在，抹除老师；这一目标遭到众人一致反对。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.jp: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.zh_cn: 贝雅特里谢从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人，此前亦为奥利斯学院的主席。总体而言其意图恶毒并带坏了奥利斯学生。她曾试图以将墩子作为祭品和泄露基沃托斯位置给色彩为代价，试图从后者处获得力量，但最终失败并直接导致了最终篇中的事件。其因泄露位置一事而被认为背叛了盖玛特利亚，遭其众人遗弃。

desc.en: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 玛艾斯托洛是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 戈尔孔特是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: 黑服宣佈將她逐出組織。
desc.jp: 黑服宣佈將她逐出組織。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服宣布将她逐出组织。

desc.en: 貝雅特里謝被逐出組織後，三人繼續會議。
desc.jp: 貝雅特里謝被逐出組織後，三人繼續會議。
desc.zh_cn: {cf贝雅特里谢}被逐出组织后，三人继续会议。

desc.en: The RABBIT Squad is on clean-up duty after field day. Saki is disappointed that they didn't do well in the competition, but Miyu reminds her that protecting the citizens of Kivotos was its own reward, and everyone agrees. As the after-party begins, the RABBIT Squad decides to continue their operation a little longer to keep the students safe.
desc.jp: The RABBIT Squad is on clean-up duty after field day. Saki is disappointed that they didn't do well in the competition, but Miyu reminds her that protecting the citizens of Kivotos was its own reward, and everyone agrees. As the after-party begins, the RABBIT Squad decides to continue their operation a little longer to keep the students safe.
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}召开了晄轮大祭反省会。{cf咲希}因为没有在比赛中取得好成绩情绪低落，但{cf美优}说「可以守护市民的安全，我觉得很有意义」，大家也对此表示同感。然后，作为一天的结束，{cnRABBIT小队}决定前往后夜祭警备，继续守护学生们的安全。

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.en: Miyu reluctantly agrees to try to teach the novice fisherman how to properly fish. They're eventually joined by one of the villagers, and the group enjoy a delicious fish barbecue.
desc.jp: Miyu reluctantly agrees to try to teach the novice fisherman how to properly fish. They're eventually joined by one of the villagers, and the group enjoy a delicious fish barbecue.
desc.zh_cn: 在钓客的拜托下，{cf美优}决定教他怎么钓鱼。在{cnRABBIT小队}成员们钓鱼的时候，村民们带着海鲜到来，大家一起享受着BBQ度过愉快的时光。

hobby.jp: 銃器の整備、植物などの採集
否定的な妄想、現実逃避、小石探し
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 负面妄想、逃避现实、寻找卵石
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 负面的妄想、逃避现实、收集小石头
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 负面妄想、逃避现实、寻找卵石

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

hobby.jp: 打ち上げ花火
動物系の動画鑑賞

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 113th track in Blue Archive OST, a theme song for the RABBIT Squad. It has become a meme song symbolizing Blue Archive.
desc.jp: The 113th track in Blue Archive OST, a theme song for the RABBIT Squad. It has become a meme song symbolizing Blue Archive.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第113首曲子，“RABBIT小队”的主题曲。其目前已经成为象征蔚蓝档案的梗曲。

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

desc.en: In the end, Yatoura Village is transformed from an ominous fishing village into a vibrant tourist destination, and the D.U. begins receiving shrimp imports once again. Upon returning to Kousagi Park, the RABBIT Squad receives an unexpected package from Yatoura Village.
desc.jp: In the end, Yatoura Village is transformed from an ominous fishing village into a vibrant tourist destination, and the D.U. begins receiving shrimp imports once again. Upon returning to Kousagi Park, the RABBIT Squad receives an unexpected package from Yatoura Village.
desc.zh_cn: 在一连串的事件过后，夜户浦村从不祥的渔村摇身一变成为充满活力的观光渔港，D.U.的虾子流通也恢复正常。{cnRABBIT小队}成员们回到兔宝宝公园后，收到一份来自夜户浦村的包裹。

desc.en: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.jp: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.zh_cn: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。

hobby.jp: 銃器の整備、植物などの採集
動物系の動画鑑賞

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

hobby.jp: 打ち上げ花火

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
